markdownRemark.html:
I'm working with Apache 2 as a proxy again. Its pretty amazing how powerful it is - especially when it comes to filtering content.

The modextfilter provides the ability to insert practically anything that can take input via stdin and output results via stdout and make it a filter. For example, sed, discount, and source-highlight can all be used to alter content in transit from a back-end to a client.

So cool!
